tool_description: Enrich your data with just an email or a domain. Personnalize your users onboarding with their colors, logo, company description and much more.
name: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper
title: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper
tool_name: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper

api_list.name: Get domain infos from a simple url or email - POST version
api_list.description: Same request than `GET /domain/infos/{urlOrEmail}` but with a POST so it's more resilient for passing domains including special characters (especially slashes `/`).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/api/domain/infos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/api/domain/infos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
